name: Flowers, photos and pills
description:
‘When she died i thought i would never forget her, but times passes, and memories fade’  

Flowers Photos and Pills is a tiny game about the fear of forgetting, especially ones you love. Spend one last time at your nana's house and try to reconstruct all the memories of her through her objects and your camera. 

Features

📘 A lifetime of memories concentrated in 15 objects

🦋Original soundtrack to accompany your experience

🌼Handmade drawing and animations made with love frame to frame 

📸 Photo mode with freedom to take photos as you like. We would love to see your personal choices :)  

🌱📚 🍪💊 

Flowers, Photos and Pills was born during the LudumDare 50 , we leave the entry page here in case you want to see.

❗❗ We recommend downloading the game to play with the best quality ❗❗
